CustomField.description: Optional JSON template defining how to map completion context to capability parameters. Supports variable interpolation syntax (e.g., {{triggerMetadata.fromAddress}}). If blank, falls back to LLM-based parameter transformation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: JSON template for parameter mapping. Example: {"toAddresses": ["{{triggerMetadata.fromAddress}}"], "subject": "Re: {{triggerMetadata.emailSubject}}", "body": "{{summary}}"}. Leave blank to use LLM-based mapping.
CustomField.label: Completion Parameter Mapping
